Chuday Viana



For the past few years, I've been a Junior Email Specialist, gaining experience with Salesforce to create engaging content and follow best practices. My journey into digital marketing began in 2017 with a front-end course in Amsterdam, learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, followed by a back-end course. In 2020, I completed a Digital Email Marketing course through Google Digital Garage. After 1.5 years as a Junior CRM, I became certified as an SFMC Email Specialist in 2023, enhancing my skills in email creation and analysis. I'm passionate about creating effective email campaigns, reports, dashboards, and working with data using ETL processes. Currently, I'm finishing an IBM course in Data Analytics to further improve my skills.

Experience

Jr CRM Email Specialist

Just Eat Takeaway.com

With Email Marketing Mastery, I conceptualized, created, and managed email campaigns using SFMC, ensuring optimal deliverability and engagement. Implementing automation processes streamlined workflows, enhancing efficiency. Utilizing advanced data segmentation, content was personalized to target specific audience segments effectively. Analytical insights were paramount; comprehensive reports tracked KPIs and measured campaign effectiveness. Analyzing metrics, I identified trends and explored innovative AI-driven solutions to optimize strategies. In collaborative leadership, I worked with cross-functional teams, leading training sessions to ensure consistent delivery of exceptional customer service. Acting as the primary contact for new couriers, I facilitated their smooth onboarding, ensuring successful team integration.

Fev 2022 - Jan 2024

Recruitment Operations Coordinator

Just Eat Takeaway.com

I spearheaded the recruitment process, crafting a seamless hiring journey. Using Google tools, I crafted captivating interview presentations, offering candidates deeper insights into our company culture. Additionally, I played a pivotal role in refining Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) to ensure structured recruitment processes. Guiding new couriers through their onboarding journey, I provided unwavering support at every step. Furthermore, I shared my expertise with Danish and Norwegian teams, revamping recruitment campaigns and surpassing KPIs.

Jan 2021 - Feb 2022

Flight Attendant

Level Airlines - AIG Group

I conducted pre-flight safety checks, safety briefings, and demonstrated emergency equipment usage. Any cabin maintenance issues were promptly identified and reported to the Pilot-in-Command. Ensuring passengers' comfort, safety, and security was paramount with a client-centered work ethic. Proactively, I ensured passenger safety throughout all flight stages, including assisting with special needs and medical emergencies. Collaborating with the team, I ensured smooth flight operations, promptly resolving any passenger conflicts. Recognized for my dedication, I was invited to join the safety training team, contributing to the enhancement of safety protocols and procedures.

April 2019 - August 2020

Customer & Partner Support Coordinator

Booking.com

I provided exceptional customer support, adeptly navigating booking processes. Handling inbound communication via calls, emails, and live chat, I facilitated seamless partner onboarding and provided proactive support to both customers and partners. My focus on partner satisfaction extended through collaboration across teams, ensuring a cohesive and positive experience for all involved.
